title: Helen Hayes Awards Resident Acting
text: The <a href="Helen%20Hayes%20Award">Helen Hayes Award</a>s are given for acting in <a href="resident%20theatre">resident theatre</a> productions in the <a href="Washington%2C%20DC">Washington, DC</a> metropolitan area. The awards are generally divided between male and female performers, between lead and supporting performers, and since the early 1990s between dramatic plays and musicals.
